verses.name: Psalms 71:11
verses.text: Saying, God hath forsaken him: persecute and take him; for there is none to deliver him.

verses.name: Psalms 71:12
verses.text: O God, be not far from me: O my God, make haste for my help.

verses.name: Psalms 71:13
verses.text: Let them be confounded and consumed that are adversaries to my soul; let them be covered with reproach and dishonour that seek my hurt.

verses.name: Psalms 71:14
verses.text: But I will hope continually, and will yet praise thee more and more.

verses.name: Psalms 71:15
verses.text: My mouth shall shew forth thy righteousness and thy salvation all the day; for I know not the numbers thereof.
